OrgName.entry: WOMENS INTERNATIONAL LEAGUE FOR PEACE AND FREEDOM UK (SHEFFIELD GROUP), THE

Desc.entry: Aims to facilitate structural change to achieve social, economic and political equality for all without discrimination on grounds of gender, race, religion or any other. To achieve this the group works for the abolition of war, non-violent conflict resolution, social and economic justice, human rights, a sustainable environment and the equal and full participation of women at all levels of decision making and government. Open to all women who support these aims.

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Infra red hearing system, Voice synthesiser/visual display in lift, Braille plan of building
